summary: You can craft all Aetherial Artifacts, and this mod adds 2 Aetherium Crests, in the chest on the right side of the Aetherial Forge.
descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can Craft the Aetherial Artifacts, when you completet the Quest:

[b]Lost to the Ages
[/b]
In the chest with the Materials I added 2 Aetherium Crests, to craft all the artifacts, if you wish you can craft the same artifact multiple times.[u][b]
[/b][/u]
[color=#ff0000][size=5][u][b]Important Note
[/b][/u][/size][/color]
You can only craft the other artifacts, when you completet the quest[b] Lost to the Ages[/b]Â  (you have to smith one of the artifacts and talk with Katria), after Katria is done with her speech and is gone to Oblivion or whatever and it shows up: "Quest Completed" (or something like that) the other recipes appear by using the Aetherial Forge. And you can not craft them by a regular forge, just by the Aetherial Forge.

If you want more Aetherium Crests, the chest with the materials respawns after a while.

And the Aetherial Crown on the pictures is a retexture by the user: Saerileth

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74766
author: Aldi
